data.message:
Haters on this page 
Puts me in a fking rage 
I don't get why they  even here 
Just reading their shit is hurting my ears 
For someone who had come so far 
Can they even write 1 bar 
For me to write this Fkn   rap 
Have your say u think its crap?
I can't see it but I feel 
If u have changed it's no big deal 
Your songs u write are fkn ace 
Anyone that argues is a fking disgrace 
Iv known how it feels to to live in a hole 
life being shithouse living on the doll 
Trying the best to make things work 
Things get hard n drive u beserk 
Have Ya good days have Ya bad 
Have those songs that make u sad 
But knowing that u made it through 
Makes u tougher makes u true 
Depending on the type of flow 
Smoking good smoke shit smoke u never fking know 
So don't diss the way I live my life 
or rap my music I write tonight 

j rap
